morning: today we made plushies it was in a small shop called hoi hoi project first we started off with picking the template for the shape of the plushie Caitlyn and i (Yeshara) picky a bunny shape and Shenara picked a bear shape after we chose a template we started sewing, it was a very long process and took about 45 minutes then we flipped it inside out and then we starting stuffing the plushie from a small gap we left when sewing and finally after we started putting the accessories on. They had many charms to put on and we where only allowed 10 finally when we where done we put it in a box and gave it a birth certificate
title: Exploring the City
